name: Who Wants to be a Millionaire: 1st Edition
overview: Put Yourself In The Millionaire Hot Seat With Chris Tarrant giving instructions, use the Wii Remote and climb the money tree Experience all the TV show's best assets and live the tension of answering 2000 questions Choose your lifelines carefully: Will you trust the audience or will you risk the 50:50? Challenge one of your friends to win a virtual million pounds and show off your knowledge!
